description:
Direct bank payments at almost no cost to attract the next billion users. Seriously, the cheapest transaction fees ever.
- charge payments, 
- create and pay sellers plus more with every release,
- automated KYC
- best payment plugin for any platforms and marketplaces.

Please read the documentation about API:
https://mentium.gitbook.io/documentation/

name: Mentium Pay
plugin_instructions:
Setup
- Create account in mentium.io
- Get your API keys and place them in plugin
- Insert the Mentium element in your page
- Use “Create Marketplace Seller” action to add seller to your marketplace.
- Use “Create Checkout Session” action open checkout popup.

Bugs
Submit a bug report at mentium.io/

Resources
Please read the documentation about API:
https://mentium.gitbook.io/documentation/
